website_summaries.verdict: A healthy choice for dogs with sensitive skin or stomachs. LifeSource Bits add extra vitamins and minerals. Grain-free.
pros: Limited ingredients: protein, potato, additional minerals, vitamins, and antioxidants
Kibble sizes for small and large breeds
cons: A few owners said their dogs became sick after eating the food

customer_reviews.title: Best product for dogs with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on the advice of my vet. My Shih Tzu Mia Belle developed very sever allergic symptoms and we tried everything from shots to medicine to help her. The vet told us to change her food she may be allergic to something in her food. Since we switch around 4 of our favorite kinds we knew it wasn't any of them but once we switched to Blue Basics Salmon and Sweet potato it took two weeks and she was back to her old self! Her hair has since grown back in and the constant itching has stopped (thank God). And her smell is back to normal also.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Harrison

customer_reviews.title: My dog is my happy boy again and he is no longer itchy and ...
customer_reviews.text: This food is a life saver! My young beagle/jack russel mix is allergic to poultry and this food saved us needing to biy him the much more expensive, much less tasty prescription food at the vet. Most other foods that are salmon, limited ingredients will have chicken or poultry in it. This is the only food I’ve found that actually has only the salmon. Thank you blue buffalo. My dog is my happy boy again and he is no longer itchy and suffering. Thank you so very much!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela mw

customer_reviews.title: Yet again... the product I received is ...
customer_reviews.text: Yet again... the product I received is EXPIRED!! This is the second order in as many months from this seller. BEWARE and check your expiration dates before feeding this to your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Red2

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: Blue Buffalo Basics Limited Ingredient Formula Salmon and Potato recipe was recommended to me for my Labrador Retrievers by my veterinarian. Both of my dogs have allergic itching and my vet said limited ingredients and Salmon as the only source of protein is helpful to manage their condition. Plus my dogs love eating it and their coats are noticeably sleek and shiny. It’s worth it to improve their health and comfort. They are happy and energetic on their diets. Also vet recommended organic carrots as a replacement for dog treats. My dogs are loving life.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my sensitive stomach dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because it was supposed to be really good for sensitive stomach dogs but it still did not sit well with my husky. I went with Taste of the Wild and my dog hasn't had ANY digestive issues since.
customer_reviews.author: DHK

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs with food allergies so we go grain free. My dogs started having tons of skin issues so I switched them to this food. They love it, their skin is healthy and their coats are soft and shiny. It’s pricier than their old kibble but worth it for happy furkids.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Holle

customer_reviews.title: Good food, great price
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how I’m supposed to judge flavor, but my golden doodle sure seems to love it. 😋 Considering how quickly a bag goes and how expensive all dog food can be, I really went out of my way to compare everything. Hands down, Amazon’s monthly subscription is the best value out there. And there’s the benefit of having the heavy bag delivered right to the front door... no having to pick it up at the store, heft it into the car, then again into the house........
customer_reviews.author: ChyenneH

customer_reviews.title: Saved my golden retriever’s skin
customer_reviews.text: Years ago one of our golden retrievers started having a lot of skin issues. Our groomer told us to find a food that had whole salmon. Not salmon meal. And we found this. After him eating it for a while his skin issues went away and has never come back! This food has been good with all of our goldens!
customer_reviews.author: Candy przybyl

customer_reviews.title: We fed our pup this food for several months. ...
customer_reviews.text: We fed our pup this food for several months. The last bag we received gave him vomiting, diarrhea, skin and eye irritation almost immediately. Not sure if bag was tainted, or change of recipe. Moved him over to another brand and symptoms cleared up. During research I ran across many other complaints of similar instances from consumers and blue buffalo's numerous recalls. I will be avoiding this brand moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: Allergy restrictions
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to a lot of things. It was nice to be able to find a food that she can actually eat. I know that with specialized food come a heavier price. The hard thing is that it’s not cheap when you have two. I do appreciate every once and a while the food does go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Is Very Healthy As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't decide between giving this product 4 or 5 stars. The only reason that I deducted a star is that we had to start our 3 year old fur baby on a preservative/grain/wheat free diet because of food allergies. It absolutely helped, but with any kind of diet when you take away the ingredients that "taste good/adds flavor", it takes some time to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: pgt1956

customer_reviews.title: Works for both dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our weimaraner/lab is a picky eater, she really seems to enjoy this food. Our frenchton has food sensitivities, and this food seems to be just right- does not upset her tummy or skin. Kibbles are a good size for both dogs. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have a greyhound and a mix breed lab, and they absolutely adore this food. Their coats are always so shiny and healthy, and the boys love the taste. Try subscribe and save- I go through a bag and a half a month, but I have two dogs that eat a bunch, so it saves big time!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Only Food My Allergy-Prone Beagle Eats
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old beagle has been eating this food for several years, and it's the only one that doesn't cause her allergies to flare up! She's an old dog, but in great health, and I'm sure a large part is due to a good diet. She gives this food 5 stars :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I’d your dog has any type of skin or digestive issues stay away from this food. It wrecked havoc on my poor 7 month old Frenchie & 3.5 year old English Staffy’s skin and stomach! Switched to WholeHearted and within two days their symptoms have started to rapidly clear!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for my allergy prone service dog
customer_reviews.text: Max is my service dog and he has corn and chicken allergies that are severe. Hospitalized twice for anaphylaxis. Found Blue when he was 9 months old. He has been healthy and fit for 6 more than 5 years now Blue may be a little pricey, but the vet bills disappeared so in the end it has been cost effective and after all what is a few bucks for your best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: While I personally can’t rate the flavor, the dog seems to love it. Local pet store didn’t care the big bags of the salmon flavor but luckily I found it on Amazon. Price is comparable to what I would have paid at the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Red Crown

customer_reviews.title: Wrong questions
customer_reviews.text: It asked about the flavor, wish I could answer the two questions by experience but I can’t! I don’t eat dog food! Maybe you should choose other questions that could be answered by a human not flavor or ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: WS62002

customer_reviews.title: Be careful !!
customer_reviews.text: We switched our goldendoodle to this brand for his sensitive stomach and chicken allergies..everything was fine until I changed to the subscription delivery...food was not the same ingredients.did not even have the same shape.our dog began chewing at his skin,hair falling out and scratching again.very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my dogs like it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dry pet food that had small kibbles for my small dogs, which contained no chicken, and which they would eat. This one fits the bill. I leave the kibble down all day for them to snack on and they seem to really like it Very glad I found this option.
customer_reviews.author: jmh443

customer_reviews.title: A nice dog food that is been better for my dog's stomach.
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't go after it as fast as she did his old food so I can assume the flavor is not quite as good. The nutritional value seems excellent and it has really helps with her stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Raychael C

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the product image...
customer_reviews.text: I scanned a 4-pound bag of GRAIN-FREE food at a pet store and the listing came up as exactly the same. However, when you start drilling down on the different sized bags of food, the rest of the choices are NOT the grain-free variety. I ended up drilling down to the 11-pound bag which unfortunately is not grain-free. The picture is not a grain-free bag description. So don't be like me, pay attention. At the same time Amazon should not link the grain-free food to the kind that is not grain-free.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Only food that works for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog food that doesn't make my dog's stomach gurgle. When I first adopted my Rhodesian Ridgeback mix, you could see the outline of each rib - she was thin and wouldn't even eat treats because everything upset her stomach. I tried at least five other types of dog food. Now she is healthy in weight and no stomach gurgling! She's been eating this brand for at least 3.5 years now. Total change in personality, too! She's a happy and more confident dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: I love Blue Buffalo - they can truly do no wrong. This came quickly and in perfect condition - no rips or tears or anything like that. And cheaper than the pet stores! I do wish they carried the grain-free variety of this, but that's ok. If your dog is family, treat them like it. Seriously. I mean, you wouldn't feed your kids McDonald's every day, would you? Pretty much what you're doing to your dog if you go with the cheap store bought stuff (Iams, Beneful, Science Diet, Nutro, Eukaneuba, Purina). Their coat will be shinier, tummies happier, and overall health better!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo Lies
customer_reviews.text: I am heartbroken. If I could give this product a negative rating it would still not be low enough. There is a class action law suit against Blue Buffalo starting that there are ingredients in the food that are advertised as not bring included. There is also a link to an aggressive hemolytic anemia which my dog contacted and and led to her death.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: Good dog food for sensitive stomach. Think the grain free version at least might be linked with some health concerns, so I'm a little iffy about continuing with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great food!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this same food in smaller bags from petco, they don’t keep the big bags in store so I found this one and have no problems with it! My dog seems fine, poops are normal, no upset stomach, bag came in tact with no holes. I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Ayden

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: When you buy quality you expect to pay more. This is great for my dog and I loved the price so much I have it on auto deliver. I never have to worry about running out again OR having to pay a bundle more because Petsmart ran out of the big bags.

customer_reviews.title: Great food for a great  price
customer_reviews.text: I like the healthy ingredients and the fact that they are not chicken byproducts added. My dog likes it and she is not itching.

customer_reviews.title: Mixture waaayyyyu off.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for 6 months. This is second time I have ordered it from Amazon. This is the first bag that has turned out like this. The photo on the back of the bag is what I usually get. This time it appears this bag had 98% of the little pebbles rather than the triangle food (see photo). I suspect the pebbles is the potatoes and the triangles the salmon. Because of the imbalance my dogs bowel movements are basically diaherra. I buy this because he has a sensitive stomach already. This bag has really thrown him off.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Lofton

customer_reviews.text: Love Blue Buffalo dog food. My dog's coat is shinny; he feels good and has lots of energy
customer_reviews.author: John Judd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it and it's great for their coat, digests well - eliminated stinky gas problems
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: ... this food my 12 year old Golden Retriever acts like a puppy again
customer_reviews.text: Since switching to this food my 12 year old Golden Retriever acts like a puppy again. He hikes with us easily and doesn't require days to recoup after a long hike. We are so happy we made the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for your doggies
customer_reviews.text: its dog food..... dogs like it and so do I????? My dog eats BLUE only because its made with the good stuffs no horse meat ( i hope )
customer_reviews.author: Ryan N. Cox

customer_reviews.title: but the main reason I LOVED it was the price point
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the food, but the subscription price seems to increase over time. I will still continue my subscription, but the main reason I LOVED it was the price point.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cole

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Basics Limited Ingredient Diet, Natural Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Turkey & Potato Recipe| Size:11 lbBLUE Basics Dog Food is a delicious, limited-ingredient diet made from fewer ingredients selected with care, that may prove helpful to dogs with food sensitivities. All BLUE Basics recipes start with real meat from a single animal protein source not often used in dog food, plus they include pumpkin and easily digested carbohydrates. BLUE Basics Dog Food is a product of the Blue Buffalo company. Based in the United States, Blue Buffalo makes premium-quality pet foods featuring real meat, fruit and vegetables.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
And because it’s BLUE, it’s made with only the finest natural ingredients: Tasty, protein-rich, Deboned Turkey. Made with potatoes, an easily-digestible carbohydrate source. NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals and NO corn, wheat, soy, dairy or eggs
feature_bullets: STARTS WITH REAL TURKEY: A recipe that starts with real turkey as the first ingredient, this adult dry dog food features a single animal protein source along with potatoes, peas and pumpkin to support gentle digestion, making it a good option for dogs with a sensitive stomach.

LIMITED INGREDIENT DOG FOOD: BLUE Basics is a limited ingredient dog food that doesn’t contain any chicken, beef, corn, wheat, soy, dairy or eggs making it a good option for dogs with food sensitivities. Plus, it’s specifically formulated with essential proteins and carbohydrates to help meet energy requirements to promote a healthy lifestyle.

WITH LIFESOURCE BITS: This formula contains BLUE’s exclusive LifeSource Bits – a precise blend of antioxidants, vitamins and minerals carefully selected by holistic veterinarians and animal nutritionists to support immune system health, life stage requirements, and a healthy oxidative balance.

NATURAL DOG FOOD: BLUE dry dog food is formulated for the health and well-being of your dog and features the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. It never contains chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives.
Contains (1) 11lb bag of BLUE Basics Limited Ingredient Diet, Natural Adult Dry Dog Food, Turkey & Potato

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
